responses.response: The current flags are Dungeons, Tingle chets, mail, savage, all caves, all sidequests, fairies, gifts, misc, expensive, submarines and minigames.
As you can see, I got a different model! Next to that, all chests got different contents, making every objective I'm doing a total gamble.

A randomizer is a modification of the original game, where most often items get randomized to different locations, so that every playthrough is different. You could play as a different character often, and there are some different tweaks.
